description:
Gain insights into Azure Active Directory by connecting Security Insights and using the audit and sign-in logs to gather insights around Azure AD scenarios.
You can learn about app usage, conditional access policies, legacy authentication related details using sign-in logs.
You can get information on your SSPR usage, and use the audit logs table to monitor Azure AD Management activities like user, group, role, and app management.
title: Azure Active Directory

description:
Gain extensive insight into your organization's Azure Activity by analyzing, and correlating all user operations and events.
You can learn about all user operations, trends, and anomalous changes over time.nThis add-on gives you the ability to drill down into caller activities and summarize detected failure and warning events.
title: Azure Activity

description:
Gain insight into your Cisco ASA firewalls by analyzing traffic, events, and firewall operations.
This add-on analyzes Cisco ASA threat events and identifies suspicious ports, users, protocols and IP addresses.
You can learn about trends across user and data traffic directions, and drill down into the Cisco filter results.
Easily detect attacks on your organization by monitoring management operations, such as configuration and logins.
title: Cisco

description:
Gain extensive insight into your Cylance endpoint events by analyzing security and theat data.
You can correlate threat events across devices and features. This add-on exposes interesting information about Cylance malware detection, files, and devices.
You can analyze management information according to audit events, agent versions, and device events.
title: Cylance

description:
Gain extensive insight into your organization's DNS by analyzing, collecting and correlating all DNS events.
This add-on exposes a variety of information about suspicious queries, malicious IP addresses and domain operations.
title: DNS

description:
Gain insights into Microsoft Exchange online by tracing and analyzing all Exchange operations and user activities.
This add-on let you monitor user activities, including logins, account operations, permission changes, and mailbox creations to discover suspicious trends among them.
title: Exchange Online

description:
Gain insight into Fortigate firewalls by analyzing traffic and activities.
This add-on finds correlations in Fortigate threat events and identifies suspicious ports, users, protocols and IP addresses.
You can learn about trends across user and data traffic, and drill down into the Fortigate filter results.
Easily detect attacks on your organization by monitoring management operations such as configuration and logins.
title: FortiGate

description:
Gain insights into Identity and access operations by collecting and analyzing security logs, using the audit and sign-in logs to gather insights into use of Microsoft products.
You can view anomalies and trends across login events from all users and machines. This add-on also identifies suspicious entities from login and access events.
title: Identity & Access

description:
Gain insights into Insecure protocol traffic by collecting and analyzing security events from Microsoft products.
You can view analytics and quickly identify use of weak authentication as well as sources of legacy protocol traffic, like NTLM and SMBv1.
You will also have the ability to monitor use of weak ciphers, allowing you to find weak spots in your organization's security.
title: Insecure Protocols

description:
Gain insight into Juniper firewalls by analyzing security events and firewall activities.
You can find correlations between inbound and outbound traffic by IP addresses, learn about trends across sessions, and processes and identify interesting ports.
With this add-on you can detect attacks on your organization by monitoring management operations, such as configuration and logins.
title: Juniper

description:
Gain insights into Office 365 by tracing and analyzing all operations and activities. You can drill down into your SharePoint, OneDrive, Exchange, and Azure AD events.
This add-on lets you find usage trends across users, files, folders, and mailboxes, making it easier to identify anomalies in your network.
title: Office 365

description:
Gain insight and comprehensive monitoring into Palo Alto firewalls by analyzing traffic and activities.
This add-on correlates all Palo Alto data with threat events to identify suspicious entities and relationships.
You can learn about trends across user and data traffic, and drill down into Palo Alto Wildfire and filter results.
title: Palo Alto

description:
Gain insight into Palo Alto network threats by analyzing traffic and threat events.
You can extract meaningful security information by correlating data between threats, applications, and time.
This add-on makes it easy to track malware, vulnerability, and virus log events.
title: Palo Alto Networks Threat

description:
Gain insights into SharePoint and OneDrive by tracing and analyzing all operations and activities.
You can view trends across user operation, find correlations between users and files, and identify interesting information such as user IP addresses.
title: SharePoint & OneDrive
